Source.Name: polyclipping
Source.Summary: Polygon and line clipping and offsetting library
Source.Description: The Clipper library performs clipping and offsetting for both lines and polygons. All four boolean clipping operations are supported - intersection, union, difference and exclusive-or. Polygons can be of any shape including self-intersecting polygons.
